item.title: 中国在碧桂园付费后暂时避免了道德风险
item.description: 在碧桂园控股有限公司（Country Garden Holdings Co., Ltd.）支付债券利息后，中国为陷入困境的开发商提供债务支持的计划在数天内迎来了首次测试，但却避免了引发有关此类干预后果的争论。【原文：A Chinese program to backstop debt of distressed developers came within days of being tested for the first time, but averted fueling debate about the fallout from such intervention after Country Garden Holdings Co. paid bond interest.】

item.title: 日元面临压力，日本央行在定期操作中缩减债券购买规模
item.description: 与 4 月 24 日相比，日本央行在本周一的常规操作中提出购买更少量的政府债券，以减少其在该国债务市场中的存在。【原文：The Bank of Japan offered to purchase a smaller amount of government bonds in a regular operation on Monday than it did on April 24 as it seeks to reduce its presence in the country’s debt market.】

item.title: 派息是大科技公司财务实力的最新标志
